ygData.subject: Bah! Gnomes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... HAHAHA!  See?!  What did I tell ya!?  :) Lim Dul furiously shakes the irritating gnome off his leg and looks for some leaves to wipe the stains
ygData.messageBody:
>awwwwww... now my lil gnomie feelings are hurted <wipes away tear running
>down cheek...then giggles and runs to give Lim'Dul a hugg round the knees>

>Sorry.. just couldn't resist <g>

>Iggie
>Level 13 Gnome Wizzie


HAHAHA! See?! What did I tell ya!? :)

<role>Lim'Dul furiously shakes the irritating gnome off his leg and looks
for some leaves to wipe the stains off</role>

One another note, I've been experimenting with a Druid on the newer server
just to see what the fuss was about. I must say it was faster getting up
levels than I had with a Wizard. To me, a Druid is more like a weaker
Wizard but with stonger melee. Everything on the magic side was a bit
slower...you gain spells every 5 levels and you don't get meditate till 8.
:P I must say it WAS fun playing a class that could do a little of
everything...

But I'll still take a Wizard anyday. :)

-- Lim'Dul
